insert.id: create高額介護サービス費支給審査決定一時TBL

mapper.insert: CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei" ( "renban" smallint, "shokisaiHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "shokisaiHokenshaMei" character varying(40), "sakuseiYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "kokuhoRengokaiMei" character varying(40), "tsuchishoNo" character varying(40), "serviceTeikyoYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "riyoshaFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "shikyuKubnCode" character varying(1), "ketteiYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "kogakuShikyugaku" numeric(13,0), "shiharaiHohoKubunCode" character varying(1), "koshinFlag" boolean )

insert.id: do高額介護サービス費支給審査決定一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "DbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei" VALUES ( #{連番}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{証記載保険者名}, #{作成年月日}, #{国保連合会名}, #{no}, #{サービス提供年月}, #{利用者負担額}, #{支給区分コード}, #{決定年月}, #{高額支給額}, #{支払方法区分コード}, #{更新済フラグ})

update.id: do審査決定一時データを更新済にする

mapper.select:
SELECT ,
FROM ( SELECT ,
FROM "DbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei" AS SHINSAKETTEITEMP INNER JOIN "DbWT0001Hihokensha" AS HIHOKENSHATEMP ON SHINSAKETTEITEMP."renban" = HIHOKENSHATEMP."meisaiRenban" WHERE SHINSAKETTEITEMP."koshinFlag" = false ) AS TEMP LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from "rgdb"."DbT3057KogakuShikyuHanteiKekka" WHERE "DbT3057KogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."hanteiKekkaSofuYM" IS NOT NULL AND "DbT3057KogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."hanteiKekkaSofuYM" != '' AND "DbT3057KogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."shinsaKekkaHaneiKubun" != '1') AS "DbT3057KogakuShikyuHanteiKekka" ON TEMP."dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_hihokenshaNo" = "DbT3057KogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."hihokenshaNo" AND TEMP."dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_serviceTeikyoYm" = "DbT3057KogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."serviceTeikyoYM" AND TEMP."dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_shokisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT3057KogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" ORDER BY TEMP."dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_hihokenshaNo" ASC, TEMP."dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_serviceTeikyoYm" ASC, TEMP."dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shoHokenshaNo" ASC, "DbT3057KogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."rirekiNo" DESC

SELECT ,
FROM "DbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei" AS SHINSAKETTEITEMP INNER JOIN "DbWT0001Hihokensha" AS HIHOKENSHATEMP ON SHINSAKETTEITEMP."renban" = HIHOKENSHATEMP."meisaiRenban" ${出力順}
mapper.sql: SHINSAKETTEITEMP."renban" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_renban", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."shokisaiHokenshaNo" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_shokisaiHokenshaNo", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."shokisaiHokenshaMei" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_shokisaiHokenshaMei", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."sakuseiYmd" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_sakuseiYmd", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."kokuhoRengokaiMei" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_kokuhoRengokaiMei", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."tsuchishoNo" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_tsuchishoNo", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."serviceTeikyoYm" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_serviceTeikyoYm", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."riyoshaFutangaku" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_riyoshaFutangaku", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."shikyuKubnCode" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_shikyuKubnCode", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."ketteiYm" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_ketteiYm", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."kogakuShikyugaku" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_kogakuShikyugaku", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."shiharaiHohoKubunCode" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_shiharaiHohoKubunCode", SHINSAKETTEITEMP."koshinFlag" AS "dbWT3058KogakuShikyuShinsaKettei_koshinFlag"
